title: I'm very sorry for my lack of awareness but did Skarner already get that hotfix? Or?

replies.body:
There's also another change in 5.17 to Skarner: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-517-notes

When the patch notes first went out Skarner's were missing, has been updated in the notes.

What he said.
It's in the 5.16 patchnotes, top of the page, added as an edit.

ps. omg pls ward the news page
They did it without actually announcing it when they did so it was easy to miss
